infos.value: Those of you that value your lives...may take your leave here.
Know that there is no shame in doing so.
None within «Fortem» would turn tail before any enemy, my queen.
Perhaps you are wondering why I ask such a thing.
Look upon the gate, and consider its appearance.
The gate...?
Oh, I see... It bears the signs of countless would-be intruders.
From Fennes, I assume?
I fear that may be true.
It could be they instinctually sensed that something of value lies within...
And so they attempted to enter Anvil Castle...
Alas, they had to abandon their wishful plundering.
The reason being...
No doubt they were driven away by whatever terrible creatures lurk within.
Now you understand that those creatures are not to be taken lightly.
I shall bear that in mind, Your Highness.
Good. Let us proceed.
We shall break down the castle gates and head straight into the castle.
For Leonis!
For Leonis!
